titles.title: To prohibit confessions of judgment in connection with the extension of covered credit or creation of covered debt, and for other purposes.
To prohibit confessions of judgment in connection with the extension of covered credit or creation of covered debt, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: This bill prohibits a confession of judgment or similar agreement as a condition to a loan or extension of credit of $2 million or less during the COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019) emergency period and for 120 days following. (A confession of judgment is an agreement to a judgment of liability without notice and opportunity to be heard in court in the event of the default of a borrower.)
